about_the_game:
This software is a collection of VRM data assets created to meet the specifications of "RPG Maker 3D Character Converter."
This is the Gee-kun-soft character "School uniform" version2.

With the 3D Character Converter, you can create walking graphics and other assets for RPG Maker Unite.


Not only for the 3D Character Converter but, this VRM data can be used for dancing in other VRM-compatible software. It can also be employed on platforms like Unity to create your own unique games. Additionally, you can utilize them as Virtual YouTubers as well.

*******************************************
7-Body Proportions, 10 Characters
VRM Files, 10 pieces

1. Red Hair, Red Eyes, Short Hair, Large Bust
2. Silver Hair, Purple Eyes, Long Hair, Large Bust
3. Light Blue Hair, Purple Eyes, Long Hair, Elf Ears
4. Purple Hair, Blue Eyes, Long Hair
5. Brown Hair, Red Eyes, Medium Hair, Large Bust
6. Red Hair, Red Eyes, Long Hair, Large Bust
7. Blue Hair, Red Eyes, Short Hair, Large Bust
8. Blonde Hair, Orange Eyes, Short Hair, Large Bust
9. Green Hair, Blue Eyes, Medium Hair
10. Purple Hair, Blue Eyes, Medium Hair, Large Bust
*******************************************
